Resistance to Ghaznavi

Vidyadhara was the most powerful ruler of the Chandela dynasty. He was the only Indian ruler who successfully resisted Mahmud of Ghazni (in 1019 and 1022 CE). Ghazni failed to capture the fort of Kalinjar and eventually returned after a treaty.

тЪФя╕П
End of Kannauj

He punished the Pratihara king Rajyapala of Kannauj for surrendering (fleeing) before Ghaznavi and had him killed. The Kandariya Mahadeva Temple, the grandest temple of Khajuraho, was completed by Vidyadhara to commemorate his moral victory over Ghaznavi.
